strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
kjv_def: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.
